item.title: Easiest Way to Turn Off the Annoying iPhone 12 Flashlight Lock Screen - Revealed!
item.description: Introduction The iPhone 12 flashlight feature is a great tool to have when you need a quick burst of light. However, the flashlight can be a bit annoying when it automatically turns on when you unlock your phone. Fortunately, there is an easy way to turn off the flashlight lock screen. Benefits of Turning Off the Flashlight Lock Screen Turning off the iPhone 12 flashlight lock screen will give you a few benefits.
